statements: DELETE FROM customer_behavior_analysis WHERE customer_id = 101 AND age < 25;
DELETE FROM customer_behavior_analysis WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 30;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age < 18 OR gender = 'Other';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE product_name LIKE 'T-shirt%' AND price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE age > 50 AND customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Orders);
DELETE FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Cancelled' OR total_amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity < 5;
